name: Development Protocol
description: The Network Canvas development protocol is designed for our team to test new features. It is not intended for general use.

prompts.text: Who would _you_ consider to be a **close friend**?

introductionPanel.title: Introduction to the alter form
introductionPanel.text:
This is some **markdown** that 
* explains this interface and 
* is *marked down*. 

Below this might be as much additional text as the researcher desires. The container that this content is in should dynamically expand to accommodate that.

An alternative alter edge interface
introductionPanel.text: This interface acts on professional edges.

stages.label: InfoSound
stages.title: This interface has a video with sound.

items.content: The video below has sound and is set to loop. Some arbitrary text content that can _contain_ **formatting**.

# h1 Heading 8-)
## h2 Heading
### h3 Heading
#### h4 Heading
##### h5 Heading
###### h6 Heading


## Horizontal Rules

___

---

***


## Emphasis

**This is bold text**

__This is bold text__

*This is italic text* 

_This is italic text_ 
# Emoji 
:blush: :heartpulse: :wave:
